item.title: GCC: Generative Color Constancy via Diffusing a Color Checker
item.description: GCC: Color constancy through diffusion, inpainting a color checker for stable illumination estimation.

item.title: AuraFusion360: Augmented Unseen Region Alignment for Reference-based 360° Unbounded Scene Inpainting
item.description: AuraFusion360: High-quality 360° scene inpainting achieved via novel augmented unseen region alignment and a new benchmark dataset.
